content: free knitting pattern **sizing ** one size customizable to any size sample scarf long edge 77 cm 30 3 in short edge 53 cm 20 9 in **gauge ** 20 stitches x 42 row in lacy grid stitch pattern on a 3 5 mm us 4 needles = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches **needles ** any straight or circular 3 5 mm us 4 needles **materials ** recommended 50 g safran by drops design 50 g = 160 m 175 yds **level of difficulty ** easy or 2/5 or beginner required skills following written lace pattern icelandic bind off
